HTML formatting Leader HTML Inherit from site Theme If set, leader templates from the site theme will be used instead of group-defined leader templates. Widget Leader This HTML is rendered within the wrapping <div> tag of each rendered widget, but before the widget's header and content. Widget header Leader This HTML is rendered within the wrapping <div> tag of each rendered widget's header (if a header is rendered), but before the content of the widget's header. Page tabs Leader This HTML is rendered within the wrapping <div> tag of the page's tabs, but before the list of the page's tabs. Layout Region Leader This HTML is rendered within the wrapping <div> tag of each region within a layout, but before the content (widgets) of the region. Trailer HTML Inherit from site Theme If set, trailer templates from the site theme will be used instead of group-defined trailer templates. Widget Trailer This HTML is rendered within the wrapping <div> tag of each rendered widget, but after the widget's header and content. Widget header Trailer This HTML is rendered within the wrapping <div> tag of each rendered widget's header (if a header is rendered), but after the content of the widget's header. Page tabs Trailer This HTML is rendered within the wrapping <div> tag of the page's tabs, but after the list of the page's tabs. Layout Region Trailer This HTML is rendered within the wrapping <div> tag of each region within a layout, but after the content (widgets) of the region. Notification From email address Email address used on notification emails from this site that can not be replied to. It is commonly set to an address such as 'noreply@localhost.com'. Invalid email address. Enable RSS feeds for public forums Q&A forums will generate RSS feeds for all public Q&A forums. Number of Top posters Number of top posters to display in the site statistics (max is 100 / min is 1). Value must be integer and between 1 and 100. Prevent Duplicate posts Prevent a user from making duplicate posts within the interval set below. Duplicate post interval (In Minutes) Time interval between posts to consider posts with the same by the same user as duplicates. Set to 0 to never allow duplicates. Allow Emoticons Can users use emoticons within posts. Popular post replies How many posts are required before a thread becomes popular? Popular posts views How many views are required before a thread becomes popular? Popular posts Age (In days) Days posts must be active within, i.e. received a new post. Minimum value is 1 Enable post censorship Controls whether posts are filtered for censored words based on the words listed in the Word censors administration page. Require edit notes Controls whether edit notes are required or not for editing of posts. User posting Performance Controls the display of how active a user is within the site. Display user rank as a Picture Choose yes if you want to display user performance by a pictured rank. Otherwise it will be displayed as text. Allow user posting as anonymous Controls whether authenticated users are displayed and allowed to post as anonymous onto Q&A forums. This option is displayed when anonymous posting is enabled. Allow post tagging Controls whether users can tag their posts and browse posts by tags. Enable thread status Tracking Controls whether thread starters may set the status of their thread with not Set, answered or not answered. Enable Tracking of poster IP address Stores the IP address of the person who posted. Display poster IP address Publicly Displays the IP address of the poster. Display poster IP address only to Administrators & moderators Displays the IP address of the poster only to administrators and moderators. Date / time Settings Date format The format of all dates displayed. The user can override this setting in his/her profile. Time format The format of all times displayed. The user can override this setting in his/her profile. Thread date filter The default criteria used when filtering threads for recency. Display edit notes When enabled displays the edits notes of a post at the bottom of the messages (before the user signature). Edit post body Age Limit (in minutes) Enables a post body to be edited until the post has aged a specified number of minutes. Specify 0 to restrict editing and -1 to not restrict editing. Delete post Age Limit (in minutes) Enables a post to be deleted by the author until the post has aged a specified number of minutes. Specify 0 to restrict deleting and -1 to not restrict deleting. Enable post Mouse-Over popup Enable Collapsing panels Enable Emoticons Enable conversation notifications When disabled, no direct message (conversation) email notifications are sent. Enable status message & comment email notifications Receive an email when someone comments on your status message or a status you also commented on. General Factor Values Calculate Manage member Points System The member Points System is not enabled in the license. Please contact Telligent Sales. Enable member Points System Enable or disable support for calculating points for posts and users. Post Points Visibility Controls which users see post points. User Points Visibility Controls which users see user points. Quality Factors Participation Post Factor Enter the amount each post will be worth. Reply Factor Enter the amount each reply will be worth for the original post. Replier Factor Enter the amount each unique replier will be worth for the original post. Additional replies to the same post from the same replier are not included in calculation. Verified answer Factor Enter the amount a user will receive for having a reply verified as the answer. Rating Factor Enter the amount each rating will be worth for the rated post. Download Factor Enter the amount each download will be worth for the original post. Downloader Factor Enter the amount each unique downloader will be worth for the original post. Additional downloads of the same post from the same downloader are not included in calculation. Bookmarked post Factor Enter the amount each post will receive for being bookmarked. User (${friend_propercase}) Factor Enter the amount each user will receive for being selected as a ${friend_lowercase}. Rater Factor Enter the amount each rater will receive for each rating given. By clicking on the button below, all points for posts and users will be (re)calculated based on current factor values. If you have changed point factors, first save your changes, then recalculate.
